.. _structuredossiers:

Structure dossier application Voo4
==================================

* Bootstrap.php
* controllers
* documentation
* infostests.inc.php
* models
* modules
* plugins
* projet.inc.php
* public
* ressources

  * deploy

    * voozanoo.txt : num√©ro de la version, trunk ou x.y.z

  * sql
  * xml

* views

  * helpers
  * scripts

    * error

      * error.phtml

    * index

      * index.phtml
